thread.title: Amazon Great Indian Diwali Sale: Amazing discounts on smartphone, electronics and fashion
thread.title_full: Amazon Great Indian Diwali Sale: Amazing discounts on smartphone, electronics and fashion

author: Aadil Ikram Zaki Iqbal | India.com News Desk
title: Amazon Great Indian Diwali Sale: Amazing discounts on smartphone, electronics and fashion
text:
Amazon Great Indian Diwali Sale: Amazing discounts on smartphone, electronics and fashion By India.com News Desk on October 26, 2015 at 4:59 PM Comments Mumbai, October 26: If you are not done with shopping ahead of festive season, then Amazon Great Indian Diwali Sale is here for you. After conducting a five-day Great Indian Festive sale ahead of Dussehra (13-17 October), Amazon India on Monday began kicked off another a three-day sale called Amazon Great Indian Diwali Sale ahead of Diwali festival. The Great Indian Diwali Sale offers huge discounts on gadgets, home & kitchen appliances, video games, cameras, fashion and other categories for the next 72 hours. If you want to flaunt Apple iPhone, then Great Indian Diwali Sale at Amazon is perfect place for you. You can buy iPhone 6S 16GB silver and gold for as low as Rs. 56,000 and the 64GB variant in silver for Rs. 66,000 as part of the Amazon Great Indian Diwali Sale. The sale also offers 46 percent off on iPhone 4S 8GB. It also great deals on other smartphones too. You can get 27 percent off on Samsung Galaxy S6 64GB Gold (Rs. 42,900), 33 percent off on Samsung Galaxy E7 White 16GB (Price: Rs. 16,000), 28 percent off on YU Yureka Plus on Android Moondust Grey (Price: Rs. 8,999) and 35 percent off on Mi4 (2 nd Gen) 3G (Price: Rs. 12,999). The iPad Air 2 16GB with Wi-Fi and Cellular is now available for Rs. 40,990. Below is the list of great deals on popular smartphones Apple: 23 percent off on Apple iPhone 6 16GB Gold (Price: Rs. 39,800) 46 percent off on Apple iPhone 4S 8GB (Price: Rs. 12,257) Samsung: 27 percent off on Samsung Galaxy S6 64GB Gold (Rs. 42,900) 3 percent off on Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge 32GB Gold (Rs. 43,500) 33 percent off on Samsung Galaxy E7 White 16GB (Price: Rs. 16,000) 26 percent off on Samsung Galaxy E5 White 16GB (Price: Rs. 10,999) 49 percent off on Samsung Galaxy Grand 2 Black 8GB (Price: Rs. 9,999) 31 percent off on Samsung Galaxy Core Prime Silver (Price: Rs. 6,999) 18 percent off on Samsung Galaxy Grand Neo Plus Gold (Price: Rs. 8,990) Xiaomi: 35 percent off on Mi4 (2nd Gen) 3G (Price: Rs. 12,999) HTC: 27 percent off on HTC One M9 Plus Gold-Silver 32GB (Price: Rs. 39,598) 24 percent off on HTC Desire 620G Milkyway Grey 8GB (Price: Rs. 11,299) 27 percent off on HTC Desire 626G+ White Birch 8GB (Price: Rs. 13,340) 17 percent off on HTC Desire 526G Plus Glossy Black 16GB (Price: Rs. 9,990) Motorola: 17 percent off on Moto E (2nd Gen) 3G (Price: Rs. 4,999) 14 percent off on Moto E (2nd Gen) 4G (Price: Rs. 5,999) Micromax YU: 19 percent off on YU Yuphoria on Android 16GB Buffed steel (Price: Rs. 6,499) 28 percent off on YU Yureka Plus on Android Moondust Grey (Price: Rs. 8,999) Other exciting deals: The Great Indian Diwali Sale offers up to 55 percent off on electronics, minimum 50 percent off on books, minimum 60 percent off on fashion and up to 70 percent off on home and kitchen products. Customers who hold Citi bank credit/debit card will get additional 15 percent and 10 percent cash back on purchase through mobile app and desktop respectively.
